Package noteApp.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerImpl
    public interface Controller
    Interface for the Controller portion of the MVC architecture. Methods that somehow modify the model are defined here and used from the View.
    Author:
    Matias Vainio

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        boolean logIn​(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Used to check user given credentials. If they match those in the database, user is logged in.
        Parameters:
        username - username given by the user.
        password - password given by the user.
        Returns:
        true if credentials are correct. False otherwise.

      • logOut

        boolean logOut()
        Removes user information from memory and disables everything that depends on user being logged in.
        Returns:
        true if data is successfully removed.

      • signUp

        boolean signUp​(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to create new user with user provided credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - username provided by the user.
        password - password provided by the user.
        Returns:
        true if the creation is successful.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if signup fails

      • lzw_compress

        java.lang.String lzw_compress​(java.lang.String input)

      • lzw_extract

        java.lang.String lzw_extract​(java.lang.String input)

      • getList

        java.util.List<Note> getList()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves a list of notes from the database. The list is passed as return value to the caller.
        Returns:
        list retrieved from the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if getting the list fails

      • saveToDatabase

        Note saveToDatabase​(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String content)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new note and saves it to the database.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the note.
        content - content of the note.
        Returns:
        Note note which has been saved to db.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if saving fails.

      • updateNote

        void updateNote​(Note note)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates selected note in the database. New notes are created as empty notes which are then modified and updated using this method.
        Parameters:
        note - note to be updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if updating fails

      • deleteFromDatabase

        void deleteFromDatabase​(Note note)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Removes selected note from the database.
        Parameters:
        note - note to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if deleting fails

        selected Noe

        Parameters:
        note - Note to set

      • startAutoSaveThread

        void startAutoSaveThread()
        Starts a new thread which handles the auto save feature.
        See Also:
        for more details.

      • archiveNote

        void archiveNote​(Note note)
        Moves selected note to a different (archive) collection in the database.
        Parameters:
        note - note to be moved
        See Also:
        Archiver

      • unarchiveNote

        void unarchiveNote​(Note note)
        Moves selected note from archive collection to the main collection in the database.
        Parameters:
        note - note to be moved.

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn()
        Check if user currently logged in.
        Returns:
        true if user is logged in.

      • toggleProps

        void toggleProps()
        Enables or disables properties in the view. Properties are different ui elements such as buttons and text areas.

      • getMlc

        MainLayoutController getMlc()
        Returns reference to MainLayoutController instance used in the application.
        Returns:
        MainLayoutController to be returned.

      • decodeFile

        void decodeFile​(org.fxmisc.richtext.InlineCssTextArea area)
        Opens a rich text file onto the text area
        Parameters:
        area - text area to where the file is loaded

      • encodeFile

        void encodeFile​(org.fxmisc.richtext.InlineCssTextArea area,
                Note saveableNote)
        Saves the note as a rich text file
        Parameters:
        area - text area from where the note is taken
        saveableNote - to be saved

      • setOfflineNotes

        void setOfflineNotes()
        Sets notes to view from offline directory.

        void addToNotesList​(Note note)
        Adds provided note to a list in the view.
        Parameters:
        note - {Note} note to be added.

      • getState

        SaveState getState()
        Returns currently set save state.
        Returns:
        SaveState state to be returned.

      • setState

        void setState​(SaveState state)
        Sets save state. Used to change saving functionalities between local and database.
        Parameters:
        state - SaveState state to be set.

      • setArchivedNotesToView

        void setArchivedNotesToView()
        Sets notes that have the '%a' string in the title to the view.

      • setDefaultNotesToView

        void setDefaultNotesToView()
        Sets notes that does not have the '%a' string in the title to the view.

      • setEmptyList

        void setEmptyList()
        Sets empty list to the view.
